Home Instruction in Voice Culture--Instruction in vocal culture should be given in the home. Parents should teach their children to speak so 
                                                                           184
plainly that the listeners can understand every word. They should teach them to read the Bible with clear, distinct utterance in a way that will honor God. And let not those who kneel around the family altar put their faces in their hands close down to the chair when they address God. Let them lift up their heads and with holy awe speak to their heavenly Father, uttering their words in tones that can be heard.
